div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:

description.value: HL7 Belgium terminology Implementation Guide (IG).

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

description.value: Basic Laterality as requested by CIN-NIC, subset of be-vs-body-laterality
Unique Identifier for Allergies in the Belgian Health Landscape

Unique Identifier for Lab Report Diagnostic Report

Retam code (Belgian subset of LOINC + Albert Code)
Allergy / intolerance codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FOD Terminology Center. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.
Causative Agents for Allergy (non medication)
Civil state in Belgium.
Contact person in Belgium.
FedICT country codes.
healthcare party in Belgium.

Codes supported by eHealth Platform differentiating types of civil state. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort. Whenever possible add a code from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus for international interoperability but also use https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/core/CodeSystem/CD-CIVILSTATE for the Belgian specific code.
Maximum valuest to define category of a contact person, using the HL7 values and the Belgian CD-CONTACT-PERSON values.
Care Location Code System
Partial agreement values
List of pseudonymization versions that can be used a.o. in the Capabilities Statement
Vaccination reason status Code System.
Vaccination status Code System.
Vaccine Administration Route
Vaccine Code Code System - set of Belgian codes for types of vaccines that are administered
Vaccine Target Disease Code System - set of Belgian codes for diseases targeted by the vaccines
Codes to illustrate differentiating types of exposure route. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.
Codes as communicated by the FOD Terminology Center differentiating types of no allergies. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.
Codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FPS Terminology Center differentiating types of risk manifestation. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.
Codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FOD Terminology Center differentiating types of allergy intolerance.

List of health care parties in Belgium

Describes the patient relationship type (the relation between the patient and the person implied)

Vaccination reason code Value Set - the reasons for an vaccination
Vaccination status reason Value Set - the reasons for an vaccination status - typically representing the reason why a vaccination is not performed
Vaccine Administration Route
Vaccine Code Value Set - the types of vaccines that are administered in Belgium
Vaccine Target Disease Value Set - the types of diseases that targeted by the vaccines
Body Site
Body Site CodeSystem
Code System for specific types of coded annotations
Value Set for specific types of coded annotations

Errors in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.
Agreement types for MyCareNet flows. Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be
This code system is to identify Albert code
Annex types for MyCareNet flows. Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be

Decision values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) The codes are not defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.
Message events for MyCareNet flows.Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be

Legal pathology situation codes as defined by NIHDI to be used in the pathology registration flows of MyCareNet. These values are managed by NIHDI. The codes are not defined here. Consult the cookbooks on mycarenet.be for concrete usage instructions.
Refusal values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.)
Waiting for information values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.)
